gov.usgs.anss.metadata

Class IRCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.anss.metadata.IRCode

  • public class IRCode
extends java.lang.Object
    IRCode.java - An IR code basically contains the IRCODE and all of its aliases. It maintains a static Map to all of the IRCode objects created. There can be only one such object associated with an ir code. There are static methods to add new ircodes and alias and to get the current IRCode object associated with any IRCODE.

      add to an IRCode for the give ircode the given other codes, By convention the first code added to this IR code is the network assigned code, or, the code which the channel is known in the channel databases.

      • getIRCodeForNetCode

        public static java.lang.String getIRCodeForNetCode(java.lang.String code)
        given any code, return the IRcode
        Parameters:
        code - The code
        Returns:
        the 7 characte NNSSSSS for the matching code, return null if no such code

      • addIRCode

        public static void addIRCode(java.lang.String ir,
                             java.lang.String other)
        add to an IRCode for the give ircode the given other codes, By convention the first code added to this IR code is the network assigned code, or, the code which the channel is known in the channel databases.
        Parameters:
        ir - The IRcode to add to
        other - The code to add to the alias list

      • getIRCode

        public static IRCode getIRCode(java.lang.String ir)
        return the IRCode object association with the given ir code
        Parameters:
        ir - The IR code to match
        Returns:
        the IRCode object for this ircode, or null if no match is found

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String code)
